mapper.select:
select id, code, name, brand, category, classification, common_name, dosage_form, usages, applicable_symptoms, applicable_disease, packing_list, dosage_use, validity_period, approval_number, manufacturer, unit_price, create_date, images from drug_info where 1 = 1
AND code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{drugInfo.code},'%')
AND name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{drugInfo.name},'%')
AND brand LIKE CONCAT('%',#{drugInfo.brand},'%')
AND category = #{drugInfo.category}
order by create_date desc
